tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id UUID NOT NULL,
    sender_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    receiver_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    user_email VARCHAR(255),
    user_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_organizations (
    organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_name VARCHAR(255),
    organization_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_access_controls (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    organization_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES blockchain_users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES blockchain_organizations(organization_id)
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_views (
    view_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    view_name VARCHAR(255),
    view_query TEXT
)
